snippet.title: The Book of Opposites: The Role of the Nuclear Receptor Co-regulators in the Suppression of Epidermal Genes by Retinoic Acid and Thyroid Hormone Receptors
snippet.description:
* May 2005 The Book of Opposites: The Role of the Nuclear Receptor Co-regulators in the Suppression of Epidermal Genes by Retinoic Acid and Thyroid Hormone Receptors free
* Sang H Jho, * Constantinos Vouthounis, * Brian Lee, * Olivera Stojadinovic, * Mark J Im, * Harold Brem, * Ankit Merchant, * Katherine Chau & * Marjana Tomic-Canic * \+ et al.
Journal of Investigative Dermatology 124, 1034-1043 doi:10.1111/j.0022-202X.2005.23691.x

snippet.title: Spatial Memory Consolidation is Associated with Induction of Several Lysine-Acetyltransferase (Histone Acetyltransferase) Expression Levels and H2B/H4 Acetylation-Dependent Transcriptional Events in the Rat Hippocampus
snippet.description:
* 1 September 2010 Spatial Memory Consolidation is Associated with Induction of Several Lysine-Acetyltransferase (Histone Acetyltransferase) Expression Levels and H2B/H4 Acetylation-Dependent Transcriptional Events in the Rat Hippocampus free
* Olivier Bousiges, * Anne Pereira de Vasconcelos, * Romain Neidl, * Brigitte Cosquer, * Karine Herbeaux, * Irina Panteleeva, * Jean-Philippe Loeffler, * Jean-Christophe Cassel & * Anne-Laurence Boutillier * \+ et al.
Neuropsychopharmacology 35, 2521-2537 doi:10.1038/npp.2010.117
Rights and permissions
